|location=Palermo |year=1994 |pages=364–88}} *{{cite encyclopedia |ref=harv |first=Jacques |last=Chiffoleau |title=Arles, regno di |year=2005 |encyclopedia=Federico II: enciclopedia fridericiana |volume=Vol. 1 |location=Rome |publisher=Istituto dell'Enciclopedia Italiana |url=http://www.treccani.it/enciclopedia/regno-di-arles_(Federiciana)/}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Christopher |last=Cope |title=Phoenix Frustrated: The Lost Kingdom of Burgundy |publisher=Constable |year=1987}} *{{cite book |last=Cox |first=Eugene L. |title=The Green Count of Savoy |location=Princeton, NJ |publisher=Princeton University Press |year=1967 |ref=harv}} *{{cite book |title=The Eagles of Savoy |last= Cox |first= Eugene L. |location=Princeton, NJ |year=1974 |publisher= Princeton University Press |ref=harv}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |last= Cox |first= Eugene L. |chapter=The Kingdom of Burgundy, the Lands of the House of Savoy and Adjacent Territories |pages=358–74 |editor=[[David Abulafia]] |title=The New Cambridge Medieval History, Volume V: ''c''. 1198–''c''. 1300 |year=1999 |publisher=Cambridge University Press}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Norman |last=Davies |year=2011 |title=Vanished Kingdoms: The History of Half-Forgotten Europe |publisher=Penguin}} *{{cite journal |ref=harv |first=Jacques de |last=Font-Réaulx |title=Les diplômes de Frédéric Barberousse relatifs au royaume d'Arles à propos d'un livre récent |journal=Annales du Midi |year=1939 |volume=51 |issue=203 |pages=295–306 |url=http://www.persee.fr/doc/anami_0003-4398_1939_num_51_203_5476}} *{{cite book Rodolphe de Habsbourg, 1250–1291 |url=https://books.google.ca/books?id=inIUAAAAYAAJ}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Paul |last=Fournier |location=Paris |publisher=Alphonse Picard |year=1891 |title=Le royaume d'Arles et de Vienne (1138–1378): Étude sur la formation territoriale de la France dans l'Ést et le Sudest |url=https://archive.org/details/leroyaumedarlese00four}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Paul |last=Fournier |publisher=Cambridge University Press |editor1=C. W. Previté-Orton |editor2=Z. N. Brooke |chapter=The Kingdom of Burgundy or Arles from the Eleventh to the Fifteenth Century |pages=306–31 |chapter-url=https://archive.org/stream/in.ernet.dli.2015.180100/2015.180100.The-Cambridge-Medieval-History-vol-viii#page/n329/mode/2up |title=The Cambridge Medieval History, Volume VIII: The Close of the Middle Ages |year=1936}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Marie-Luise |last=Heckmann |chapter=Das Reichsvikariat des Dauphins im Arelat 1378: vier Diplome zur Westpolitik Kaiser Karls IV |title=Manipulus florum: Festschrift für Peter Johanek zum 60. Geburtstag |editor1=Ellen Widder |editor2=Mark Mersiowsky |editor3=Maria-Theresia Leuker |location=Münster |publisher=Waxmann |year=2000 |pages=63–97}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Louis |last=Jacob |title=Le royaume de Bourgogne sous les empereurs franconiens (1038–1125): Essai sur la domination impériale dans l'est et le sud-est de la France aux XIme et XIIme siècles |publisher=Honoré Champion |location=Paris |year=1906 |url=https://books.google.ca/books?id=PKhLAQAAMAAJ}} *{{cite journal |ref=harv |authorlink=Reginald L. Poole |title=Burgundian Notes, III: The Union of the Two Kingdoms of Burgundy |first=Reginald |last=Poole |journal=English Historical Review |volume=28 |issue=109 |year=1913 |pages=106–12}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |authorlink=René Poupardin |first=René |last=Poupardin |title=Le royaume de Bourgogne (888–1038): étude sur les origines du royaume d'Arles |publisher=Honoré Champion |location=Paris |year=1907 |url=http://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/bpt6k5530689v}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |authorlink=Charles William Previté-Orton |first=Charles William |last=Previté-Orton |title=The Early History of the House of Savoy (1000–1233) |publisher=Cambridge University Press |year=1912 |url=https://archive.org/details/earlyhistoryofho00prevuoft}} *{{cite journal |ref=harv |first=Paul |last=Viard |year=1911 |title=La dîme ecclésiastique dans le royaume d'Arles et de Vienne aux XIIe et XIIIe siècles |journal=Zeitschrift der Savigny-Stiftung für Rechtsgeschichte. Kanonistische Abteilung |volume=1 |issue=1 |pages=126–59}} *{{cite book |ref=harv |first=Peter |last=Wilson |title=Heart of Europe: A History of the Holy Roman Empire |location=Cambridge, MA |publisher=Belknap Press |year=2016}} {{refend}} {{coord|43.68|4.65|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Arles, Kingdom of}} [[Category:States and territories established in the 930s]] [[Category:States and territories disestablished in 1378]] [[Category:11th century in the Holy Roman Empire]] [[Category:Former monarchies of Europe]] [[Category:Kingdom of Burgundy]] [[Category:Arles|Kingdom of Arles]] [[Category:1378 disestablishments in Europe]] [[Category:Medieval Switzerland]] [[Category:933 establishments]] [[Category:1030s establishments in the Holy Roman Empire]] [[Category:1032 establishments in Europe]] [[Category:Monarchy of the Holy Roman Empire]] [[Category:History of Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur]] [[Category:History of Rhône-Alpes]] [[Category:History of Franche-Comté]] [[Category:10th-century establishments in France]] [[de:Königreich Burgund#Königreich Arelat]] [[hu:Burgundiai Királyság]]

page.title: List of social nudity places in Europe

revision.text:
[[File:Nudists at Formentera beach 0240.jpg|thumb|right|Swimmers enter the water at a Spanish beach.]] [[File:Nude_Beach_from_Behind.jpg|thumb|right|Nude woman on a French beach.]] [[File:Eingang von Euronat in Frankreich.JPG|thumb|right|Entrance to the [[Euronat (naturist resort)|Euronat]] naturist resort in France]]
This '''list of social nudity places in Europe''' is a [[list of places where social nudity is practised]] for recreation in [[Europe]]. It includes free beaches (or clothing-optional beaches or [[nude beach]]es) and some resorts.
== Austria == {{ref improve section|date=August 2018}} * [[Keutschacher See]] in [[Carinthia (state)|Carinthia]]<ref>{{cite web|title=Naturism och campingplatser i Kärnten|url=https://nudist-semester.blogspot.com/2013/09/naturism-i-osterrike.html|website=Nudist Semester|trans-title=Naturism and campsites in Carinthia|language=swedish}}</ref> * Tigringer See<ref>{{cite web|title=10 der schönsten FKK-Campingplätze in Europa|url=https://www.travelbook.de/uebernachten/campen/fkk-campingplaetze-in-europa|website=Travelbook|language=german|date=29 September 2017|trans-title=10 of the most beautiful nudist campsites in Europe}}</ref> * [[Pleschinger See]] * [[Weikerlsee]]
In [[Vienna]] the following beaches can be found
* [[Donauinsel]] (an [[artificial island]] in the [[Danube]] quite close to the city centre) * [[:de:Gänsehäufel]] * [[Lobau]]
== Belgium == Topfree sunbathing is tolerated on all beaches.{{citation needed|date=November 2014}} * Athena Hélios in [[Meerbeek]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturistdirectory.com/Belgium|title=Naturist holidays in Belgium|author=|date=|work=naturistdirectory.com|accessdate=28 November 2016}}</ref> * Athena le Perron in [[Waimes]] * Bockstaelhoeve in [[Zegelsem]] * [[Bredene]] is the only official nude beach in Belgium. * Natuur Puur in [[Herselt]] * 't Vennebos Natuurleven in [[Langdorp-Aarschot]]
== Bulgaria == Unlike the former [[East Germany]], but like many other countries that were part of the [[Communist bloc]] Bulgaria's nudists were kept cordoned off behind tall fences.{{sfn|McLellan|2011|p=144}} There are however a number beaches on the [[Bulgarian Black Sea Coast]] where nudism is practised; there are no official nude beaches. People always enter naked in public baths, but those are separate for men and women.{{sfn|Bousfield|Richardson|2002|pp=64-64}}<ref name="bulg_Then">{{Cite web | title = The nudist beaches on the Bulgarian sea coast | author = | work = bulgariansearesorts.com | date = | accessdate = 2016-06-21 | url = http://www.bulgariansearesorts.com/beaches/nudist-beaches/ | language = | quote = }}</ref> * [[Primorsko]] * [[Sunny Beach]] * [[Irakli (beach)|Irakli]]<ref name="Guardian2009">{{Cite web | title = Saving Bulgaria's wild beaches from development | last = Lanyado | first = Benji | work = the Guardian | date = 25 April 2009 | accessdate = 2016-06-21 | url = https://www.theguardian.com/travel/2009/apr/25/bulgaria-beaches-black-sea-nudists | language = | quote = }}</ref><ref name="lone_Bulg">{{Cite web | title = Bulgarian Riviera: best beaches of the Black Sea coast | work = Lonely Planet | date = 15 December 2014 | accessdate = 2016-06-21 | url = https://www.lonelyplanet.com/bulgaria/black-sea-coast/travel-tips-and-articles/bulgarian-riviera-best-beaches-of-the-black-sea-coast | quote = }}</ref> * Silistar *[[Ahtopol]]{{sfn|Cody|2007|p=121}} * Camping Delfin * Baltata * Panorama * Galata * Fichoza * Tsarski * [[Alepu]] * Arkutino * Ropotamo Mouth * Perla * Dolphin Beach * Lipite * Listi *[[Sinemorets]]{{sfn|Bousfield|Richardson|2002|p=415}}
== Crimea == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} * [[Koktebel]], formerly known as Planerskoye, located in south-eastern [[Crimea]]. * [[Lisya buhta]], a remote place in south-east Crimea, popular with nudists, ravers and [[Rastafari]] in the summer.
== Croatia == [[File:Lokrum nude beach.jpg|thumb|200px|Nude bathing site on [[Lokrum]] island near Dubrovnik]] [[File:Kasuni beach Split.jpg|thumb|200px|Kasjuni beach near [[Split, Croatia|Split]]]] [[File:Zečevo Island off the Soline Peninsula (Hvar).jpg|thumb|200px|Zečevo, a naturist island with pebble beaches and pine woods, 15 minutes by boat from [[Jelsa, Croatia|Jelsa]], Island Hvar]] [[File:Mlaska.jpg|thumb|200px|Mlaska beach, Island Hvar]]
Croatia has a well developed naturist culture with camp sites and hotels specifically catering for naturists. Naturism has been popular in Croatia ever since the future [[King Edward VIII]] and his then-mistress, [[Wallis Simpson]], were allowed to swim nude at one of [[Rab]]'s beaches in 1936.<ref name="coom_Kaya">{{cite web | title = Kayaking holiday in Croatia: Paddle in paradise | last = Southerden| first = Louise | work = Cooma-Monaro Express | date = 26 October 2014 | accessdate = 2014-10-26 | url = http://www.coomaexpress.com.au/story/2650660/kayaking-holiday-in-croatia-paddle-in-paradise/?cs=4081 | quote = }}</ref><ref name="web._Beac">{{cite news | title = Beach bums: Naturist package holiday to Croatia | author = Tristan Rutherford | work = The Independent | date = 18 June 2014 | accessdate = 2014-10-26 | url = https://www.independent.co.uk/travel/europe/beach-bums-naturist-package-holiday-to-croatia-9544381.html | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20140618094941/http://www.independent.co.uk/travel/europe/beach-bums-naturist-package-holiday-to-croatia-9544381.html | archive-date=2014-06-18 | via=[[Internet Archive]] }}</ref><ref name="Bradbury">{{cite book|last=Bradbury|first=Paul |title=Hvar: An Insider's Guide to Croatia's Premier Island|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=Kd019WSN9ugC&pg=PT146|publisher=Xentral Methods|isbn=978-981-08-9405-4|pages=146–}}</ref> Toplessness is permitted on most beaches.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.thedubrovniktimes.com/news/croatia/item/3279-croatia-is-very-open-to-breasts-one-of-the-most-open-countries-in-the-world|website=The Dubrovnik Times|title='Croatia is very open to breasts, one of the most open countries in the world'|author=Mark Thomas|date=15 October 2017}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g294453-i1554-k10526809-Topless_sunbathing-Croatia.html|title=topless sunbathing - Croatia Forum - TripAdvisor|website=www.tripadvisor.com}}</ref>
=== Istria peninsula === On the [[Istria]] peninsula the following nude beaches and resorts can be found:
* Naturist Park Koversada,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.campingrovinjvrsar.com/Campsites/Naturizam_Koversada_Camp_Vrsar |title=Campsite Naturist Park Koversada – Maistra – Vrsar, Istria, Croatia |publisher=Campingrovinjvrsar.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref><ref name=Rutherford>{{cite newspaper|title=Beach bums: Naturist package holiday to Croatia|url=https://www.independent.co.uk/travel/europe/beach-bums-naturist-package-holiday-to-croatia-9544381.html|newspaper=Independent|author=Tristan Rutherford|date=17 June 2014}}</ref> located at {{Coord|45|08|6.5|N|13|36|18.5|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}} near [[Vrsar]] is the biggest and one of the first naturist resorts in Europe.<ref name="Griest2007">{{cite book|last=Griest|first=Stephanie Elizondo |title=100 Places Every Woman Should Go|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=pnd2LjALLKgC&pg=PT106|year=2007|publisher=Solas House|isbn=978-1-932361-77-3|pages=106–}}</ref> * Camping ''Valalta'',<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.valalta.hr/ |title=Naturist camp Valalta |publisher=Valalta.hr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> located at {{Coord|45|07|22|N|13|37|47|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}} near [[Rovinj]]. * Naturist Resort Solaris,<ref>{{cite web|author= |url=http://www.valamar.com/en/apartments-porec/naturist-resort-solaris |title=Naturist Resort Solaris Poreč, Croatia, Istria |publisher=Valamar.com |date=2014-05-17 |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref><ref name=Rutherford/> located at {{Coord|45|17|13|N|13|35|08|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}} near [[Poreč]]. * Naturist Camping Istra,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.camping-adriatic.com/istra-naturist-camp-porec |title=Naturist Camping Istra Poreč, Croatia |publisher=Camping Adriatic |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> located at {{Coord|45|10|29|N|13|35|55|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}} near [[Poreč]]. * Kamp Kažela, [[Medulin]] * Camp Punta Eva-Polari, [[Rovinj]] * Camping Zelena Laguna, [[Poreč]] * Kamp Ulika, [[Červar]] * Camp Kanegra, [[Crveni Vrh]]
=== Kvarner gulf === In the [[Kvarner]] gulf the following nude beaches and resorts can be found:
* On [[Cres]] island there are two beaches with naturist hotels and camping, one is ''Kovačine''{{citation needed|date=October 2014}} near the town of [[Cres (town)|Cres]], and the other is Baldarin<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.camp-baldarin.com/naturist-camping.aspx |title=Naturism Camping - a Croatian Heritage |publisher=Camp Baldarin |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> near [[Punta Križa]], located at {{Coord|44|36|56|N|14|30|28|E|type:landmark_scale:50000}}. * On [[Krk]] island there are a number of naturist beaches and at least two naturist camping resorts, namely Camping Konobe<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.hoteli-punat.hr/en/naturist-kamp-konobe-37/ |title=Naturist Kamp Konobe |publisher=Hoteli-punat.hr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> and Naturist Camp Bunculuka<ref>[http://www.camping.hr/campsites/bunculuka-naturistNaturist Camping Bunculuka]{{dead link|date=May 2017 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}</ref> Camping Konobe is located at {{Coord|44|59|39|N|14|37|36|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}} and Naturist Camp Bunculuka is located at {{Coord|44|58|10|N|14|46|03|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}}. Camping Politin, now known as Camping Krk was a naturist resort but is now a textile only campsite<ref name="camp_Natu">{{cite web | title = Naturism on Cres & Krk | author = | work = Camp Baldarin | date = | accessdate = 2014-10-26 | url = http://www.camp-baldarin.com/naturist-camping-for-visitors-to-krk-and-cres-islands.aspx | language = | quote = }}</ref> * [[Losinj]] island, Mali Lošinj, FKK beaches like ''Sunčana Uvala'' located around {{Coord|44|31|15|N|14|27|45|E|type:landmark_scale:100000}}. * Camping Strasko, [[Novalja]]
=== Dalmatia === In [[Dalmatia]] gulf the following nude beaches and resorts can be found:
* Kašjuni beach, [[Split (city)|Split]].<ref>[https://pelicantourssplit.com/nudist-beaches-in-split/ Nudist beaches in Split Croatia, 2018]</ref> * [[Nugal, Croatia|Nugal]] beach, between [[Makarska]] and [[Tucepi]]. * [[Sveti Petar (Makarska, Croatia)|Sv. Petar]] beach, central [[Makarska]] town. * [[Lokrum]] island (beach), [[Dubrovnik]].<ref>{{cite book|title=Croatia|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=x49sCwAAQBAJ|first=Piers|last=Letcher|publisher=Bradt Travel Guides|year=2016|isbn=9781784770082|page=375}}</ref> * Camp Sovinje, [[Tkon]]
* [[Jerolim (island)|Jerolim]], [[Paklinski Islands]], Island of [[Hvar]] * Glavica Beach and Camp Nudist, [[Vrboska]], Island of [[Hvar]] * Zecevo Beach, Island Zečevo [[Vrboska]], Island of [[Hvar]] * Kamp Mlaska, [[Sućuraj]], Island of [[Hvar]] * Mekićevica Beach, [[Hvar (city)|Hvar]] * Robinson beach, [[Hvar (city)|Hvar]], east of the beach.
== Cyprus == [[File:Ammoui Beach In Lara.jpg|thumb|Ammoui Beach, Cyprus]] There are no legal nudist beaches in Cyprus. A number of beaches, including the beach at [[Avdimou]], have signs warning that nudism is not permitted. A community leader of [[Pissouri]] said that for decades there has been an "unspoken understanding" whereby nudism would be tolerated at an area away from the main beach at Pissouri, but not on the beach of Pissouri Bay. According to the community leader, nudists may visit the area which is on the eastern side of the bay, beyond the cliffs, as it offers some privacy.<ref name="cypr_Part">{{Cite web | title = Partial blind eye turned on nudism | last = Browne | first = Bejay | work = Cyprus Mail | date = 24 April 2016 | accessdate = 2016-04-25 | url = http://cyprus-mail.com/2016/04/24/partial-blind-eye-turned-on-nudism/ | quote = }}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://cyprusnudists.com/ |title=Cyprus Nude Beaches |accessdate=2017-05-04 |deadurl=bot: unknown |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150801110102/http://cyprusnudists.com/ |archivedate=August 1, 2015 |df= }}</ref> * North Cyprus Golden Sand Beach is an unofficial nude beach located at the end of the [[Karpass Peninsula]] in [[Northern Cyprus]]. There are no facilities. There is a sign board which says: "Beyond this point you may encounter nude bathers".<ref name="auto">{{cite web|url=http://www.capnbarefoot.info/cyprus:cyprus|title=cap’n barefoot’s naturist guide TO THE GREEK ISLANDS|accessdate=2018-04-12}}</ref> * Ammoui Beach, Lara Beach is located in the [[Akamas]] Peninsula in the [[Paphos District]] of Cyprus. It is very long sandy beach and very quiet for its size. Nudists stay at the far end near the white cliffs.<ref name="auto"/>
== Czech Republic == Topfree is tolerated on all places.{{citation needed|date=August 2012}} Public nudity is not illegal in the Czech Republic, but it may be regulated by local authorities.{{citation needed|date=November 2014}} * There are about one hundred officially recognized naturist localities.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturista.cz/lokality/ftexta1.htm |title=CZ Naturist Sites - text |publisher=Naturista.cz |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref>
== Denmark == Since 1976 it is permissible to be nude at any beach in Denmark. There are more than {{convert|7000|km}} of coastline to choose from. A large number of clothing-optional beaches exist throughout the country.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.strandguide.dk/index.php?id=362&L=1 |title=BeachGuide.dk - Your guide to naturist / clothes-optional beaches in Denmark |publisher=Strandguide.dk |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref>
The beach at the village of Husby in the [[Holstebro Municipality]] is being promoted as a [[Freikörperkultur|FKK]] beach.<ref name="tvmi_Hols">{{cite web |title=Holstebro satser på nøgenbadere |author=Lars Lauridsen |work=tvmidtvest.dk |date=28 October 2014 |accessdate=2014-10-28 |url=http://www.tvmidtvest.dk/indhold/holstebro-vil-have-nudisterne |language=Danish |quote= |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141028183009/http://www.tvmidtvest.dk/indhold/holstebro-vil-have-nudisterne |archivedate=28 October 2014 |df= }}</ref>
Naturist swims are held in the Blovstrød ([[Allerød Municipality]]) indoor swimming pool on Friday evenings in Autumn.<ref name="alle_Såsm">{{Cite web | title = Så smider de tøjet igen i Blovstrød Svømmehal - Allerød Nyt | last = Bjerborg | first = Steen Tue | work = alleroed.lokalavisen.dk | date = 9 September 2015 | accessdate = 2015-09-10 | url = http://alleroed.lokalavisen.dk/saa-smider-de-toejet-igen-i-blovstroed-svoemmehal-/Lokale-nyheder/20150909/artikler/709109942/1008 | language = Danish| quote = }}</ref>
== Estonia == Estonian naturist beaches used to be overseen by the NGO Estnat (which closed in 2012<ref>[[:et:Eesti Naturistide Ühing]]</ref>). No tickets are necessary.
* [[Tallinn]] has an unofficial, but tolerated naturist beach. It is situated about 3 km north-east of the ferry port, at the very northern end of the textile beach. The nude beach is near (north-east of) the textile beach at Pikakari beach.<ref>{{cite web|title=Banned: No separate area for nudists on the beach of Pirita|url=https://www.gotallinn.info/news/1675952|date=1 June 2017|website=www.gotallinn.info}}</ref> * [[Tartu]] has an unofficial naturist lawn beach which is situated right next the city one at the end of Ranna tee (on the other side of the [[Emajõgi]] river from [[Supilinn]] pond). * [[Pärnu]] has an unofficial but tolerated woman's and men's beach between the official beach and [[Pärnu (river)|Pärnu river]]. * [[Narva-Jõesuu]] nude beach – the only official nude beach in Estonia.{{citation needed|date=August 2012}} Located near Narva-Jõesuu town, 2 km SW from the town border.
== Finland == {{ref improve section|date=August 2018}} * [[Helsinki]]: ** [[Pihlajasaari]]: Has a unisex nudist beach, consisting almost entirely of rocky [[cliff]]s, with no [[sand]]. Not very suitable for swimming. ** [[Seurasaari]]: Separate nudist beaches for men and women. No unisex nudist area. ** [[Yrjönkatu Swimming Hall]]: a swimming hall in a historic architecture. Gender separated by day of week. *A small section of the [[Yyteri]] beach near [[Pori]] is designated as a unisex nudist beach. A flat beach covered in sand and much more suitable for swimming than Pihlajasaari. * The Tulliranta beach near [[Hanko]] has a designated nudist section.<ref name="Hanko2017">{{Cite web | title = The Unique Tulliniemi | author = | work = Hanko: The Sunny South of Finland | date = 2017|p=14 | accessdate = 2018-08-09 | url = https://tourism.hanko.fi/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Hanko_2017_ENG_Lowres.pdf | quote = }}</ref>
== France == {{See also|fr:Liste de plages naturistes françaises}}
* There are many naturist resorts on the Atlantic coast, for example [[CHM Montalivet]], [[Euronat (naturist resort)|Euronat]] and La Jenny. * The [[Mediterranean Sea|Mediterranean]] seaside town of [[Cap d'Agde, France|Cap d'Agde]] has a large naturist village with sandy beach, several swimming pools, but also nude shopping. * Leucate<ref>{{cite web|url=http://leucate.sitego.fr/ |title=Réception: Leucate-Naturiste |publisher=Leucate.sitego.fr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref> Naturist Villages, and a {{convert|1200|m|yd}} long beach is one of the best places on Mediterranean to practise naturism * Aphrodite Village,<ref name="Réception: Aphrodite">{{cite web|url=http://aphrodite.sitego.fr// |title=Réception: Aphrodite |publisher=aphrodite.sitego.fr |date= |accessdate=2016-03-07}}</ref> Oasis Village,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://oasis.sitego.fr/ |title=Réception: Oasis |publisher=oasis.sitego.fr |date= |accessdate=2016-03-07}}</ref> Village camping Ulysse,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://ulysse.sitego.fr/ |title=Réception: Ulysse |publisher=ulysse.sitego.fr/ |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref> Eden Plage,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://eden-naturisme.sitego.fr/ |title=Réception: Eden |publisher=eden-naturisme.sitego.fr/ |date= |accessdate=2016-03-07}}</ref> are open 300 days per year. * [[Île du Levant]], an island in the [[Mediterranean Sea]] has a nudist town, Héliopolis,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://heliopolis.sitego.fr/ |title=Réception: Héliopolis |publisher=heliopolis.sitego.fr/ |date= |accessdate=2016-03-07}}</ref> and a nudist beach known as Plage des Grottes. * Plage de Pampelonne in [[Ramatuelle]] near [[Saint-Tropez]] * Plage du Layet near [[Cavalaire]]. * There are beaches on many rivers, some well known, some informal: Céze, Ardeche, Truyère * [[Topfree equality|Topfreedom]] is tolerated (and common) on almost all beaches{{citation needed|date=August 2012}}
=== Alsace === Naturist venues in [[Alsace]].
* Association Naturiste de Sauvegarde et d’Animation du Blauelsand (ANSAB)<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.cra-ffn.fr/pansab/ansab.html |title=Association Naturiste du Blauelsand - ANSAB - gravière du Rhin, Strasbourg - CRA-FFN |publisher=Cra-ffn.fr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://ffn-naturisme.com/centres/association-naturiste-de-sauvegarde-et-d-animation-du-blauelsand-ansab/ |title=FFN - Fédération française de naturisme - Association Naturiste de Sauvegarde et d'Animation du Blauelsand (ANSAB) |publisher=Ffn-naturisme.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref> * Centre Gymnique d’Alsace<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.cra-ffn.fr/pcga/cga.html |title=Centre Gymnique d'Alsace - CGA, camping naturiste à Wasselonne - CRA-FFN |publisher=Cra-ffn.fr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://ffn-naturisme.com/centres/centre-gymnique-d-alsace/ |title=FFN - Fédération française de naturisme - Centre Gymnique d'Alsace |publisher=Ffn-naturisme.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref> * Les Naturistes d’Alsace<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.cra-ffn.fr/pna/na.html |title=Les Naturistes d'Alsace - Naturisme à Strasbourg Illkirch - CRA-FFN |publisher=Cra-ffn.fr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://ffn-naturisme.com/centres/les-naturistes-d-alsace/ |title=FFN - Fédération française de naturisme - Les Naturistes d'Alsace |publisher=Ffn-naturisme.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref> * Club du Soleil [[Mulhouse]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.cra-ffn.fr/pcsm/csm.html |title=Club du Soleil de Mulhouse, Reguisheim - Naturisme Illfeld - CRA-FFN |publisher=Cra-ffn.fr |date= |accessdate=2015-08-15}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://ffn-naturisme.com/centres/club-du-soleil-de-mulhouse/ |title=FFN - Fédération française de naturisme - == Germany == [[File:FKK-Gelande Sudstrand Strandimpressionen (2200637243).jpg|thumb|right|Naturist beach in Germany.]]
Public nudity is not illegal in Germany but may be regulated by local authorities mostly because of safety and health issues, not morality. Apart from urban areas and public baths (some of which offer nude swimming days), nude bathing is common in Germany: unofficial clothing optional areas exist at most lakes and rivers and other sites, such as abandoned sand and rock quarries. Many designated ''[[Freikörperkultur]]'' (FKK – Free Body Culture) areas exist at the seaside, at lakes and in baths, especially in the former [[East Germany]], where nudism remains more widespread than in the west. Many unregulated clothing optional (FKK) free beaches are available along the Nordsee and Baltic seashores, [[Rügen]] and other islands. The attitude is: all beaches are nude beaches until somebody complains. Families especially like to spend their leisure time in naturist areas; [[sauna]] bathing is generally practiced in the nude.<ref name="Miami Herald">{{cite web| title = The naked truth about Germany: Clothing is optional| last = Schofield | first = Matthew | work = Miami Herald| date = 14 August 2015| accessdate = 2015-08-15| url = http://www.miamiherald.com/news/nation-world/world/article31105532.html| quote =}}</ref>
The list of social nudity places in Germany includes:<ref name="natu_Euro">{{cite web| title = Europe - Naturist Germany in Destinations| author =| work = Naturist travel| date =| accessdate = 2014-10-27| url = http://www.naturisttravel.net/reviews_view.asp?t=+Naturist+Germany&id=996&cid=5 | language =| quote =}}</ref>
* The Schönfeldwiese in the [[Englischer Garten]], [[Munich]] as well as the southern part of Feldmochinger See, in the northwestern suburb, the peninsula in Lake [[Feringasee]] in the northeast and the Flaucher at the river [[Isar]] south of the city center of Munich. * The [[Tiergarten (park)|Tiergarten]], [[Berlin]]<ref name="letemps2016">{{Cite web | title = Berlin, haut lieu du naturisme allemand | trans-title = Berlin, the Mecca of German naturism | last = Versieux | first = Nathalie | work = Le Temps | date = 17 July 2016 | accessdate = 2016-08-03 | url = https://www.letemps.ch/societe/2016/07/17/berlin-haut-lieu-naturisme-allemand | language = fr | quote = }}</ref> * [[Wannsee]], Berlin * [[Travemünde]] * [[Sylt]] * [[Grömitz]] * [[Borkum]] * [[Norderney]] * [[Baden-Baden]] is a city located near the French border. This city has many natural [[mineral spring]]s and numerous clothes free bath houses are located there. * [[Zeesen]]<ref name="maz-_Zuha">{{Cite web | title = Nackte Tatsachen an der Zeesener Seenplatte | trans-title = Naked on the Zeesener Lakeland | work = Märkische Allgemeine Zeitung | date = 19 September 2016 | accessdate = 2016-10-02 | url = http://www.maz-online.de/Lokales/Dahme-Spreewald/Nackte-Tatsachen-an-der-Zeesener-Seenplatte | language = de | quote = }}</ref>
== Greece == [[File:Crete komos beach.jpg|thumb|right|Komos Beach on the south coast of Crete, near Matala]]
Naturism is practised widely in the Greek Islands although, strictly speaking, legal only in a relatively few designated locations but almost on all islands there are unofficial nudist beaches. [[Topfree]] is tolerated on almost all beaches.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.barefoot.info/|title=cap’n barefoot’s naturist guide TO THE GREEK ISLANDS|accessdate=2018-04-12}}</ref>
=== Crete === Beaches and resorts in [[Crete]] include:
* Filaki beach, the only official nudist beach near the Vritomartis naturist resort.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.vritomartis.com/ |title=Naturist Holidays at Vritomartis Nudist Resort in Crete |publisher=Vritomartis.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> * Glyka Nera (Sweet water beach) between Chora Sfakion and [[Loutro (Chania), Greece|Loutro]]. * Diskos near Lentos. * [[Plakias]], the south-eastern part of the beach is used by naturists. * North of [[Matala, Crete|Matala]] there is a very long nude beach; the southern end of the beach is used by clothed people. * [[Sougia]], the eastern part of the beach is for nude bathing.
=== Other areas === * [[Vlychada]] beach on [[Santorini]]; the southern part of the beach is used by naturists. * Velanio beach on [[Skopelos]] island, [[Northern Sporades]]. * Mouda beach, a great wild sandy beach south of [[Kefalonia]] island, [[Ionian Islands]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://naturist-kefalonia.com/index.php?lang=en&page=plages |title=Naturist Kefalonia |publisher=naturist-kefalonia.com |date= |accessdate=2015-09-13}}</ref> * Mantomata Beach{{efn|Location of Mantomata beach {{coord|36.329126| 28.211984|format=dms|display=inline}} }} in [[Faliraki]] on [[Rhodes]] is the only official nudist beach, though there are more beaches where nudism is common, for example a part of [[Kallithea]]. * Katergo and Agios Nikolaos beaches on [[Folegandros]] island.<ref name="en.p_Your">{{Cite web | title = Your bare-all guide to nudist beaches in Greece | last = Sinanidis | first = Mary | work = themanews.com | date = 11 July 2014 | accessdate = 2016-08-07 | url = http://en.protothema.gr/your-bare-all-guide-to-nudist-beaches-in-greece/ | quote = }}</ref>
== Hungary == {{refimprove section|date=August 2018}} * Aqua Land, [[Ráckeve]] – naturist sauna and bathing nights<ref>{{cite web|title=Köszöntjük az Aqua Land világában!|trans-title=Welcome to Aqua Land!|url=http://www.aqua-land.hu/|language=hungarian}}</ref>{{Failed verification|date=November 2018}} * Budapest IV district – Palotai sziget – crossroad Vaci ut and Megyeri ut * Gárdony * [[Ányás]] * [[Balatonakali]] * [[Balatonberény]] * [[Délegyháza]], Naturista Oázis Camping lake no. 5 and other lakes around – 30 km south from [[Budapest]] * [[Látóképi-tó]], [[Látókép]] * [[Nemesbük]] * [[Szalk]], [[Szalkszentmárton]] * [[Kiskundorozsma]], [[Sziksósfürdö]] (a.k.a. "Sziki"), [[Szeged]] * [[Szigetmonostor]] * [[Dunaparti]], [[Kiskunlacháza]]
== Iceland == Public nudity is not common, but occasionally practised, since there are natural thermal pools in remote areas. An example is Hellulaug geothermal pool in [[Vatnsfjörður]] fjord in the [[Westfjords]] of Iceland. Hellulaug pool is a geothermal pool which is located right by the beach. It is lovely sitting there with the view of the ocean and Vatnsfjörður fjord. Hellulaug cannot be seen from the road, but there is a parking lot above the pool and a good path down to the ocean. The pool is {{convert|60|cm}} deep and the temperature of the water is about {{convert|38|C}}. The geothermal water comes from a borehole above the pool.
== Ireland == * Brittas Bay,{{efn|Location of Brittas Bay, Ireland {{coord|52|50|45|N|006|05|32|W|display=inline}} }} [[County Wicklow]].<ref name="nude-irish">{{cite web|url=http://www.irishcentral.com/travel/Top-nudist-destinations-in-Ireland---Irish-beaches-ranked-amongst-worlds-best-137746718.html|title=Top nudist destinations in Ireland - Irish beaches ranked amongst world's best|publisher=IrishCentral|date=2012-01-20}}</ref><ref name="iris_Agui">{{Cite web | title = A guide to Ireland's nudist beaches and nine places naturists can sunbathe in the nip | last = Rogers | first = Mal | work = Irish Post | date = 20 August 2016 | accessdate = 2016-08-27 | url = http://irishpost.co.uk/bare-facts-irelands-nudist-beaches/?platform=hootsuite | quote = }}</ref> * Corballis, [[Donabate]], [[County Dublin]].<ref name="nude-irish" /> * Hawk Cliff, [[Dalkey]], [[County Dublin]], is the first official nudist beach in Ireland. It is due to open in April 2018.<ref>{{cite news|url=https://www.breakingnews.ie/ireland/irelands-first-official-nudist-beach-to-open-next-month-834391.html|title=Ireland's first official nudist beach to open next month|date=26 March 2018|website=BreakingNews.ie}}</ref> * Roundstone, [[County Galway]].<ref name="nude-irish" /> * Silver Strand Beach, [[Barna]], County Galway.<ref name="nude-irish" /> * West Cork, [[County Cork]].<ref name="nude-irish" /> *[[Curracloe]] strand is used by naturists and it has been proposed as an official naturist beach.<ref name="Independent.ie2016">{{Cite web | title = Naturists want 'designated nude area' at popular beach | last = Tucker | first = David | work = Independent.ie | date = 20 July 2016 | accessdate = 2016-07-21 | url = http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/naturists-want-designated-nude-area-at-popular-beach-34900701.html | quote = }}</ref>
== Italy ==
=== Abruzzo === * Official nude beach "Le Morge", in [[Torino di Sangro]].
=== Calabria === * Nudist beach of Pizzo Greco Naturist Camping<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.pizzogreco.com|accessdate=2018-03-14|title=Pizzo Greco Camping}}</ref>, in [[Isola di Capo Rizzuto]]
=== Campania === * Official nude beach "Spiaggia del Troncone" (Troncone beach), in [[Marina di Camerota]]. State road SS 562, coming from Palinuro towards Marina di Camerota before entering tunnel. Located at 40.006826, 15.340612 Beautiful beach with clear and clean water, protected by a rock wall in which there's a recess with natural shade. <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.italianaturista.it/public/naturismo/spiaggia_troncone_marina_camerota_6820.htm |title=Spiaggia del Troncone - Marina di Camerota (SA) |publisher=Italianaturista.it |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref>
=== Emilia-Romagna === * Official nude beach "Lido di Dante" in [[Ravenna]]. Located at {{Coord|44|23|20|N|12|18|00|E|type:landmark_scale:20000}} * A beach on the River [[Trebbia]] near [[Bobbio]] - km 81. state road 45, a place suitable for all.
=== Friuli-Venezia Giulia === * Cava Casali beach near [[Sistiana]] and [[Duino]] [[Trieste]] – km. 137 state road 14. * Costa dei Barbari beach near [[Sistiana]] and [[Duino]] [[Trieste]] – km. 139 state road 14. * Filtri beach near [[Sistiana]] and {{ill|Grignano (Trieste)|it|lt=Grignano}} [[Trieste]] – km. 143 state road 14, very difficult to reach.
=== Lazio === * Arenauta beach near [[Gaeta]]– km. 24,5 state road 213. * ''Oasi di [[Capocotta]]'', to the south-west, on the Tyrrhenian sea, an official nudist beach on the coast between [[Ostia (town)|Ostia]] and [[Torvaianica]]. * [[Lake Martignano]], a small lake near [[Falconeto]] and [[Anguillara Sabazia]]. Entrance from the Anguillarese road, beach located at {{Coord|42|06|30|N|12|19|30|E|type:landmark_scale:10000}}. The side to the right of the main beach, very far from the entrance, is reserved to nudism (avoid bringing music).
=== Liguria === * Guvano beach near [[Corniglia]] – The beach is accessible, from the railway station, via a disused railway tunnel. * [[Chiavari]] beach (an unofficial, but tolerated naturist beach, at the very western end of textiler beach).
=== Lombardy === * La Rocca nude beach in [[Manerba del Garda]] located at {{Coord|45.552|10.578|type:landmark_scale:20000}} nudism from 1956. Official [[Lake Garda]] nudist beach. * Restaurante L'Italo Americano in [[Cerro Maggiore]], the first nudist restaurant in Italy, which opened in 2016.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.news.com.au/travel/travel-ideas/weird-and-wacky/inside-italys-first-and-only-nudist-restaurant-litalo-americano/news-story/5f644365a2a627f94ceb484f05def07d|title=Inside Italy’s first and only nudist restaurant L’Italo Americano|author=Silvia Marchetti|date=19 September 2016|work=news.com.au|accessdate=28 November 2016}}</ref> The restaurant has an American 1930s ambience and a dining spot which turns into a disco dance floor at midnight.
=== Sardinia === * Hundreds of small, secluded beaches can occasionally become nudist corners. Traditional places are the beaches [[Cala di Volpe]], [[Liscia di Vacca]], to the north of [[Pitrizza Hotel]] and [[Piccolo Pevero]] beach, the far side to the right after the rocks. * [[Capo Falcone]] near [[Stintino]]. * [[Porto Ferro]] near [[Alghero]] and [[Sassari]] * Marina di Arbus, [[Costa Verde (Sardinia)|Costa Verde]]. The rough west coast has lonely beaches and coves for sunbathing. The area is less developed for tourists, so you can enjoy nature.
=== Sicily === Many beaches in Sicily are topless, and there are also naturist beaches.<ref>{{cite web|author= |url=http://naturismoinsicilia.it |title=NATURISMO IN SICILIA | i luoghi dove fare naturismo | Bellissime spiagge dove praticare il naturismo in Sicilia |publisher=Naturismoinsicilia.it |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|author= |url=http://www.unionenaturistisiciliani.it |title=Sicilian Naturist Association |date= |accessdate=2018-03-09}}</ref> * Torre Salsa, close to [[Siculiana]], is inside a [[World Wide Fund for Nature|WWF]] protected area. On the eastern end of the beach, close to the white cliffs, there is an unofficial naturist wide sandy beach, mostly frequented by couples and families.{{ efn|location of the naturist part of the beach {{Coord|37|21|17|N|13|21|27|E|type:landmark_scale:20000}}}}<ref name=FNI>{{cite web|title=Free Beaches Frequented By Naturists|url=http://www.fenait.org/index.php/en/57-free-naturist-beaches/215-siciliy|website=Federazione Naturista Italiana}}</ref> * Bulala, Gela (CL), is an official naturist beach, authorized in 2016. It is a wide sandy beach, and at the moment no services are available.{{ efn|location of the Bulala beach {{Coord|37|02|06|N|14|18|01|E|type:landmark_scale:20000}}}} * Spiaggia Calamosche * Eloro – Marianelli on the south-eastern side of Sicily. Suitable for gay and naturist bathers.<ref>{{cite web|title=Gay Beaches in Italy: Everything You Should Know!|url=https://www.travelbyinterest.com/blog/article/3/gay-beaches-in-italy-everything-you-should-know|website=Travel By Interest|date=7 September 2017|author=Mat Thomson}}</ref><ref name=FNI/> * Capo Feto beach in [[Mazara del Vallo]]<ref name=FNI/> * Casello 41 beach in [[Selinunte]]<ref name=FNI/>
=== Tuscany === * A nudist beach is in [[Capalbio]]. * Official nudist beach called "Nido dell'Aquila"<ref>[http://www.spiaggianaturistanidodellaquila.it/Spiaggia_Naturista_Nido_dellAquila/Spiaggia_Naturista_Nido_dellAquila.html] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20130511062922/http://www.spiaggianaturistanidodellaquila.it/Spiaggia_Naturista_Nido_dellAquila/Spiaggia_Naturista_Nido_dellAquila.html |date=May 11, 2013 }}</ref> * On [[Elba]] island, the beaches [[Acquarilli Capoliveri]] and [[Fetovaia]].
=== Veneto === * Spiaggia del Mort Nudist Beach in "Isola del Mort" island, near [[Jesolo]]. * Nudist beach "Baia delle sirene" at [[Punta S. Vigilio]] near the town of [[Garda (VR)]]. * Alberoni beach, [[Lido di Venezia]], [[Venice]].<ref>{{cite newspaper|title=Venice on a budget: how to eat, drink and travel cheaply|url=https://www.theguardian.com/travel/2013/oct/18/venice-on-a-budget-eat-drink-cheaply|newspaper=The Guardian|author=Becky Barnicoat|date=18 October 2013|access-date=16 March 2018}}</ref>
== Latvia == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} Latvian naturist beaches are overseen by the "Latvian Naturist Association".
* [[Vecāķi]] official naturist beach. The biggest of Latvia's naturist beaches, situated a little way north of Vecāķi village. To get there from Riga take the Riga-Saulkrasti railway line and get off at Vecāķi or bus Nr24 or small bus Nr200&224. * [[Inčupe]] naturist beach. A medium-sized beach, situated near the [[Saulkrasti]] railway line on the southern bank of the Inčupe river about 50 km from Riga. * [[Lielupe]] beach. A small, unofficial naturist beach, on the left bank of the Lielupe river delta. * [[Ventspils]] city has an official naturist beach. * [[Liepāja]] unofficial naturist beach. Also quite small, situated about 3 km south of Liepaja.
== Lithuania == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} Naturist beaches in Lithuania are overseen by local communities. * [[Giruliai]] naturist beach – A small official naturist beach in [[Klaipėda]]. * [[Smiltynė]] naturist beach – A large official naturist beach in [[Klaipėda]]. * [[Nida, Lithuania|Nida]] naturist beach – A very large, official naturist beach. Located on the north shore of the Curonian Spit, just a few kilometers east of the border of Russian [[Kaliningrad]] enclave. * [[Šventoji, Lithuania|Šventoji]] naturist beach – A small official naturist beach in [[Palanga]]. * [[Nemirseta]] beach – A small unofficial naturist beach in [[Palanga]].
== Luxembourg == * De Reenert ([[Wiltz]])<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturist-resort.com/naturist-resort-de-reenert.html |title=Naturist resort De Reenert |publisher=Naturist-resort.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> * Camping Bleesbruck ([[Bleesbruck]])<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturistdirectory.com/Luxembourg/627/Camping-Bleesbruck |title=Camping Bleesbruck |publisher=Naturistdirectory.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref>
== Malta == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} *[[Ġnejna Bay]] (nudity is against Maltese law, but it is tolerated in this bay)
== Montenegro == * [[Ada Bojana]], the biggest nudist beach in the country.<ref>{{cite web|title=Sandy Beaches, Blue Waters: Seaside secrets|url=http://www.balkaninsight.com/en/article/sandy-beaches-blue-waters-seaside-secrets-of-the-balkans|date=11 July 2011|website=Balkan Insight}}</ref> * [[Jaz Beach|Jaz]], the southernmost part of the beach used to be declared nudist but was made regular in 2007 * [[Ratac]], is outside Bar in the direction of Budva, near [[Sutomore]]<ref>{{cite web|title=Bar Top 5|url=https://www.visit-montenegro.com/main-cities/bar/bar-top-5/|website=Visit Montenegro|accessdate=15 September 2017}}</ref> * [[Njivice, Montenegro|Njivice]], a village on the south-western shore of the Bay of [[Herceg Novi]] ([[Boka Kotorska]] bay) the nudist beach is located on Hotel Riviera's beach * Camp Full Monte, A clothing optional, off-grid, eco campsite close the Montenegro/Croatia border crossing, run by an English couple. * Crvena Glavica beach, [[Sveti Stefan]] * Hotel Albatros in [[Ulcinj]] has two beaches, a textile beach, and a nudist beach.
== Netherlands == [[Sauna in the Dutch language area|Public saunas]] in the Netherlands are always mixed gender and nudity is the norm when using these. In the Netherlands tanning top free is legal on almost all beaches. Municipalities with a beach (usually including quiet parts) tend to have a nudist beach; even if the municipality does not like it, it designates a quiet part as such in order to be able to forbid nudity on the rest of the beach.{{Citation needed|date=August 2009}} * [[Almere]], Zilverstrand * [[Amsterdamse Bos]], Zonneweide (from April 1 to September 30) * Lake [[Gaasperplas]] near [[Amsterdam]] access [[Gaasperplas metro station]].<ref name="amst_AMST">{{Cite web | title = The city beaches of Amsterdam | author = | work = Travel Guide Amsterdam | date = | accessdate = 2016-03-06 | url = http://amsterdam-touristinfo.blogspot.co.za/2014/12/the-city-beaches-of-amsterdam.html | language = | quote = }}</ref> * [[Bussloo]], longest nude beach in the Netherlands * [[Bloemendaal aan Zee]], nude beach at the north part of the beach * [[Callantsoog]], sandy beach {{convert|1.5|km}} to the south - the oldest official nude beach in the country, dating from 1973 * Grote Plas in [[Delft]], northeast side * [[Scheveningen|Scheveningen, The Hague]], sandy beach 1 km to the north * [[Noordwijk]], North past sand dunes and World War II era bunkers * [[The Hague]], Zuiderstrand, approx. {{convert|300|m}} of sandy beach * [[Kijkduin]], The Hague, two beaches * [[IJmuiden]], nude beach at the south part of the beach * [[Zandvoort]], sandy beach {{convert|2|km}} to the south * [[Vrouwenpolder]], sandy beach.<ref name="naak_Nudi">{{Cite web | title = Nudist beach Vrouwenpolder | author = | work = naaktstrandje.nl | date = | accessdate = 2016-03-06 | url = http://www.naaktstrandje.nl/zeeland/vrouwenpolder/vrouwenpolderEngels.html | quote = }}</ref> *Veluwse Bron wellness resort<ref name="news_Howt">{{Cite web | title = How to go nude around the world | last = McLennan | first = Leah | work = NewsComAu | date = 23 October 2015 | accessdate = 2016-08-21 | url = http://www.news.com.au/travel/travel-ideas/adventure/there-are-many-great-places-to-get-nude-overseas/news-story/fdde02ffddb4a39025ba823b81389d6a | quote = }}</ref>
A pretty complete list of nude beaches in the Netherlands can be found on the Dutch language website [http://www.naaktstrandje.nl/ naaktstrandje.nl]. Here you can click on the province of your choice and get a list of beaches and other nudist activities.
== Norway == [[File:Huk, Oslo - naturist beach.jpg|thumb|right|The beach at Huk.]] * In and around [[Oslo]] ** Huk on the [[Bygdøy]] peninsula ** Svartkulp near [[Sognsvann]] ** the south east side of the islands Langøyene ** [[Kalvøya, Bærum|Kalvøya]] ** Svartskog in [[Bunnefjorden]]. * In and around [[Bergen]] ** [[Kollevågen]] on the island [[Askøy]] ** [[Rishavn]] *Sjøhaug Naturist Centre outside [[Moss, Norway|Moss]] on [[Jeløya]]<ref name="Sjøhaug">{{Cite web | title = Sjøhaug Naturistsenter | author = | work = scandinavianaturist.org | date = | accessdate = 2016-06-28 | url = http://www.scandinavianaturist.org/sjohaug/en/node/1 | language = | quote = }}</ref>
== Poland == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} [[File:2013 Woodstock 00005.jpg|thumb|[[Woodstock Festival (Poland)|Woodstock Festival]] 2013 at Poland]] * At the sea ** [[Misdroy]]-Lubiewo ** Grzybowo (near [[Kołobrzeg]]) ** [[Rowy, Pomeranian Voivodeship|Rowy]] ** [[Dębki]] ** Chałupy (at [[Hel Peninsula|Hel]] [[peninsula]]) ** Gdańsk Stogi ** Piaski ** Łeba * Inland ** Wał Miedzeszyński in [[Warsaw]] ** Wał Zawadowski in [[Warsaw]] ** Kryspinów near [[Kraków]] ** Biskupice near [[Poznań]] ** Kęty near [[Bielsko-Biała]] ** Cezar naturist recreational centre in [[Bielsko-Biała]] ** Gospodarstwo agroturystyczne near [[Włocławek]] ** Wyzwanie in [[Parcele, Pomeranian Voivodeship|Parcele]]
== Portugal == {{Main|Naturism in Portugal}} {{See also|List of beaches in Portugal}} * [[Praia da Adiça]]{{efn |Location of Praia da Adiça {{coord|38.554343| -9.188697|display=inline|format=dms}} }} [[Costa da Caparica]]<ref name="osna_Port">{{cite web| title = Portugal has more naturist Beach| work = The Naturists| date = 17 July 2015| accessdate = 2015-07-18 | url = http://osnaturistas.com/en/noticias/portugal-tem-mais-uma-praia-naturista/}}</ref><ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Ursa Beach]], [[Sintra]]<ref name="Sábado 2016">{{cite web | title=As melhores praias para nudistas em Portugal | website=Sábado | date=29 July 2016 | url=http://www.sabado.pt/multimedia/fotografias/detalhe/10_melhores_praias_para_nudistas_em_portugal_segundo_o_el_pais.html | language=pt | accessdate=3 August 2016}}</ref> * [[Praia dos Alteirinhos]], [[Zambujeira do Mar]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Ilha de Tavira]] in [[Algarve]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * Praia da [[Bordeira]] in [[Carrapateira, Aljezur|Carrapateira]] (full nudity is acceptable beyond the popular area) * [[Praia do Meco]] in [[Sesimbra]] near [[Lisbon]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Praia da Bela Vista]] near [[Lisbon]] * [[Praia do Salto]] near [[Porto Covo]], [[Alentejo]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Cabanas Velhas]] beach near [[Lagos, Portugal]], [[Algarve]] * [[Praia de Adegas]] in [[Alentejo]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Rio Alto Beach]] in [[Póvoa de Varzim]], near [[Oporto]] * [[Duna Alta]] beach near [[Oporto]] * [[Praia das Furnas]], [[Odemira]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Praia da Afurada]], [[Ferragudo]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/> * [[Barreta Island]], [[Faro District|Faro]]<ref name="Sábado 2016"/>
== Romania == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} Nudist beaches are at [[Neptun, Romania|Neptun]], [[Costineşti]], [[2 Mai]] and [[Vama Veche]] sea resorts, and the beach between [[Eforie Nord]] and [[Eforie Sud]] on the [[Black Sea]]. Also on [[Sulina]] and [[Sfântu Gheorghe, Tulcea]] ([[Danube Delta]]) there are a few wild beaches used for nudism.
Toplessness is tolerated on all Romanian beaches {{Citation needed|date=July 2009}}.
== Russia == [[File:People at the nude beach in Novosibirsk.jpg|thumb|Unofficial nude beach at the [[Novosibirsk Reservoir]], near [[Akademgorodok]]]] * The Dunes Beach near [[Sestroretsk]] (north of [[St. Petersburg]])<ref>{{cite web|author=Andrei Samartsev |url=http://dunesspb.byethost7.com/dunes_e.htm |title=The Dunes Beach |publisher=Dunesspb.byethost7.com |date= |accessdate=2013-04-22}}</ref> * Divnomorskoe * Loo ([[Sochi]]) * Serebryanyi Bor ([[Moscow]]) * Shershni (behind City beach of the Chelyabinsk)
== Serbia == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} [[Belgrade]] has several nudist beaches, including: * [[Ada Ciganlija]] nudist part * Obala * Platforma za Sunchanje * Diznilend * Hronična Bara * [[Kamenjar]] near [[Novi Sad]] has a nudist beach on the Danube{{citation needed|date=April 2017}}

== Slovenia == * Camp Smlednik ([[Smlednik]])<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturistdirectory.com/Slovenia/987/Camp-Smlednik |title=Camp Smlednik |publisher=Naturistdirectory.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> * Banovci Spa ([[Banovci, Slovenia|Banovci]])<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturistdirectory.com/Slovenia/986/Banovci-Spa |title=Banovci Spa |publisher=Naturistdirectory.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> * Atlantis Water Park ([[Ljubljana]])<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.naturistdirectory.com/Slovenia/988/Atlantis-Water-Park |title=Atlantis Water Park |publisher=Naturistdirectory.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> *Naturist Camp Mali Raj<ref name="dnma_Natu">{{Cite web | title = Društvo naturistov Mali raj | trans-title = Naturist Camp Mali Raj | author = | work = dnmaliraj.si | date = | accessdate = 2016-01-14 | url = http://www.dnmaliraj.si/naturist-camp-mali-raj/ | language = sl | quote = }}</ref>{{efn|location of Mali Raj {{coord|45.771743| 15.051655|format=dms|display=inline}} }} *Camp Dragočajna ([[Dragočajna]])<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.naturist.si/index.php/kje-v-sloveniji|title=Kje v Sloveniji|first=Super|last=User|publisher=}}</ref> *The Golden Club Tivoli ([[Ljubljana]]) *Terme Lendava ([[Lendava]]) *Društvo Naturistov Mali Raj ([[Dolenje Polje]])
== Spain == [[File:Topless Barcelona.jpg|thumb|Women sunbathing in [[monokini]]s/[[topfree]] on a beach in [[Barcelona]]. {{coord|41|23|40|N|2|12|27|E|type:landmark_scale:5000}}]] Public nudity on the beach is, in general, not illegal in Spain, however some local municipalities do outlaw nudity on beaches that are within city limits. The city of [[Cadiz]] is one example.<ref name="ABCnews No Clothes 2016">{{Cite web | title = No Clothes? No Beach. Court Rules Against Spanish Naturists | last = Heckle | first = Harold | work = ABC News | date = 21 May 2016 | accessdate = 2016-05-22 | url = http://abcnews.go.com/Health/wireStory/clothes-beach-court-rules-spanish-naturists-39277874 | quote = |location= Madrid }}</ref>
For nudity lovers, Spain offers various options for nude sunbathing. In addition to the long sandy beaches in the vicinity of large cities, topless sunbathing is possible on all beaches, even in front of smaller villages.
Following a request by the Association for the Development of Naturism (ADN) an email was sent by the city of Madrid's sports department to the 21 district heads explaining that municipal pools, if they see fit, have authorization to organize a "Bathing Suit-Free Day", or an "Optional Bathing Suit Day", some time in the 2016 summer.<ref name="elpa_Madr">{{Cite web | title = Madrid swimming pools may hold ‘Bathing Suit-Free Day’ | last = Serrato | first = Fran | last2 = Pérez-Lanzac | first2 = Carmen | work = EL PAÍS | date = 6 July 2016 | accessdate = 2016-07-07 | url = http://elpais.com/elpais/2016/07/06/inenglish/1467797593_828215.html | quote = }}</ref>
=== Canary Islands === *On the island of [[Gran Canaria]] the following are some of the beaches where nudism is practised:<ref name="gran_Gran">{{cite web | title = The Top 10 Spots To Get Naked in Gran Canaria| author =| work = Gran Canaria Info| date = 10 May 2015| accessdate = 2015-05-12 | url = http://www.gran-canaria-info.com/top-10/the-top-10-spots-to-get-naked-in-gran-canaria| quote =}}</ref> **[[Maspalomas]] **[[Playa del Inglés]] **Montaña de Arena **Guayedra **GüiGüi **Medio Almud **Tiritaña **Aguadulce **El Confital * The Magnolias Natura hotel is in [[Maspalomas]], [[Gran Canaria]] {{coord|27|45|27|N|15|35|04|W|type:landmark_scale:5000}}<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.magnoliasnatura.com/ |title=Home |publisher=Magnolias Natura |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref> * [[Charco del Palo]] on the island [[Lanzarote]] * [[La Caleta, Spain|La Caleta]] on the two wild beaches (one sand, one rocky), over the cliffs to the north of the town on the island of [[Tenerife]] * The Gran Hotel Natura is in [[Corralejo]], [[Fuerteventura]] {{coord|28|43|33|N|13|51|00|W|display=inline}}<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.granhotelnatura.com/ |title=Gran Hotel Natura Naturist & Fkk Resort Fuerteventura | Home |publisher=Granhotelnatura.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16}}</ref>
=== Mainland (Peninsula and Balearic Islands) === [[File:Nudist-Textile couple in Cabo de Gata, Spain.jpg|thumb|220x220px|Naturist in [[Cabo de Gata-Níjar Natural Park|Cabo de Gata, Spain]]]] There are hundreds of public nudist beaches in mainland Spain, all over the coast line, and some more inland. This is only a selection: * [[El Fonoll]] in [[Catalonia]] * [[Formentera]] ([[Balearic Islands]]). * [[Vera Playa]] and [[Cabo de Gata]] beaches in [[Almería (province)]] * [[Bolnuevo]] and [[El Portús]], in [[Región de Murcia]]. * [[Mar Bella (beach)|Mar Bella]] beach is the primary clothing optional beach for the city of Barcelona. * [[Praia de Figueiras]] also known as "Praia dos Alemáns" on the [[Cíes Islands]] in [[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]].
Although nudism is not illegal, it is preferable to practice it on beaches meant for that specific purpose. This is a list of nudist beaches<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.kuviajes.com/noticias/2004/0804/090810/viajes_090810-5.htm |title=Las playas nudistas de España, provincia a provincia |publisher=Kuviajes.com |date= |accessdate=2015-08-16 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150721232328/http://www.kuviajes.com/noticias/2004/0804/090810/viajes_090810-5.htm |archivedate=2015-07-21 |df= }}</ref>

== Sweden == * Stockholm area: ** Ågesta Nude Beach: Official nude beach on [[Magelungen]], maintained by NF EOS, the Scandinavian Naturalist Federation. Located about 10 km south of central Stockholm.{{efn|Location of Ågesta Nude Beach {{Coord|59|13|37|N|18|05|52|E| display=inline}} }}<ref>{{cite web|url=http://goscandinavia.about.com/od/nudismnudebeaches/qt/agestanudebeach.htm |title=Agesta Nude Beach |publisher=About.com |accessdate=January 25, 2012}}</ref> ** [[Långholmen]]: Unofficial ("spontaneous") nude beach, located on the western end of Långholmen island.{{efn|Location of Långholmen beach {{Coord|59|19|17|N|18|00|56|E| display=inline}} }} ** Källtorp Nude Beach: Unofficial ("spontaneous") nude beach, located about 6 km southeast of central Stockholm, on the southeastern end of Källtorp lake.{{efn|Location of Källtorp Nude Beach {{Coord|59|17|17|N|18|10|38|E| display=inline}} }} The beach is rocky and there are no public conveniences. ** PGs Udde Nude Beach: Unofficial ("spontaneous") nude beach, located about 5 km southeast of central Stockholm, on the northern end of Källtorp lake{{efn|Location of PGs Udde Nude Beach {{Coord|59|17|39|N|18|09|33|E| display=inline}} }} * Gothenburg area: ** [[Amundön]]: Officially nude beach on the rocks of an island south of Gothenburg, between [[Askim, Sweden|Askim]] and [[Billdal]].{{efn|Location of Amundön beach {{Coord|57|35|15|N|11|54|8|E| display=inline}} }}<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.scandinavianaturist.org/node/130 |title=Amundön |publisher=Scandinavian Naturist Portal |accessdate=February 23, 2014}}</ref> * Västergötland: ** [[Kattholmen]], unofficial nude beach at [[Saltö]] in [[Strömstad]] municipality. ** [[Korsholmen]], unofficial nude beach on [[Koster Islands|Koster]] in [[Strömstad]] municipality.
== Switzerland ==
Public nudity is generally legal in the entire country with the notable exception of the canton Appenzell Innerrhoden where public nudity, including naked hiking, carries a fine of up to 200 Swiss Francs. Nude hiking is mainly popular in the sparsely populated alpine regions among nudists, less so in the low lands.<ref name="BBC Naked Hiking">{{cite news|title=Naked Swiss hikers must cover up|url=http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/europe/8019766.stm|author=Imogen Foulkes|date=27 April 2009|accessdate=7 October 2017|publisher=BBC News|ref=BBC1}}</ref>
== Ukraine == {{unreferenced section|date=August 2018}} [[File:Nudist beach in Koktebel.jpg|thumb|right|Beach in [[Koktebel]].]]
* [[Odessa]] ** [[Chkalovsky Nudist Beach]], located south of Delfin beach and north of [[Arcadia beach]] ** [[Tikhiy]] * [[Zatoka, Odessa Oblast|Zatoka]] ** On the long [[Sandspit (landform)|sandspit]] between Zatoka and Kurortne is nudity practiced. The spit is located about {{convert|70|km}} south of Odessa. * [[Kiev]] ** [[Dovbychka]] clothing-optional beach, located on [[Trukhaniv Island]] in front of [[Hydropark in Kiev|Hydropark]] ({{Coord|50|27|2|N|30|34|8|E| region:UA_scale:10000}}) ** [[Obolonskyi Raion|Obolon]] naturist beach, located south of yacht club ({{Coord|50|31|40|N|30|31|51|E| region:UA_scale:10000}}) * [[Kharkiv]] ** [[Bezliudivka]] biggest nudist beach in Eastern Ukraine ({{Coord|49|52|58|N|36|15|16|E| region:UA_scale:10000}})

'''Mahmood Karzai''', also spelled '''Mahmud Karzai''', or '''Mahmoud Karzai''', is an Afghan businessman, CEO and Chairman of the Board for the [[Afghan Investment Company]] who is closely tied to the [[Kabul Bank]] scandal and other controversies.<ref>British Broadcasting Service, BBC, (28 November 2012) "Kabul Bank fraud profited elite, leaked audit says: Afghanistan's failed Kabul Bank was involved in a fraud that funnelled almost US$900m into the pockets of a small number of the political elite, an independent auditors' report says. https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-south-asia-20512713"</ref> He is the brother of [[Ahmed Wali Karzai]] a figure who was killed by his bodyguard in Afghanistan following various allegations surrounding narcotics, nepotism, corruption and family infighting.<ref>http://www.afghan-bios.info/index.php?option=com_afghanbios&id=39&task=view&total=2577&start=44&Itemid=2, Whose who in Afghanistan, 2011-08-14</ref> He is also the elder brother of the former president of [[Afghanistan]], [[Hamid Karzai]].
In October 2010, the ''[[Washington Post]]'' reported that Karzai could soon be indicted for tax evasion in the U.S., by the [[Internal Revenue Service]] though he is aware of the investigation, telling the newspaper: "I'm giving any charges", and insisting his only interest is "rebuilding Afghanistan." To date, no charges have been brought against Karzai.<ref name="Ahmad">{{cite news|url=https://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5jJma5WN_riCwDv-7SbQTEOx6AHsA?docId=CNG.f3c56da45464a41c1cd517b13c5de4ac.2a1|title=Afghan government orders all private banks to be audited |last=Ahmad|first=Sardar|newspaper=[[Agence France-Presse|AFP]]|date=2010-10-19|accessdate=2010-11-05}}</ref>
In 2011, investigative reporters reported that Karzai was under review by a U.S. grand jury for alleged racketeering, extortion and tax evasion. He reportedly hired a Washington, D.C.-based criminal defense attorney as a result of the grand jury investigation.<ref>"Belluz, Julia, MacCleans (7 March 2011), (Canada) "Mahmoud Karzai being investigated for racketeering, extortion and tax evasion." http://www2.macleans.ca/2011/03/07/band-of-brothers/</ref><ref>Wall Street Journal, (16 February 2011) "Grand Jury Investigates Karzai Brother
U.S. Federal Probe Risks Worsening Relations With the Afghan President; Mahmood Karzai Hires a Washington Lawyer" https://www.wsj.com/articles/SB10001424052748703312904576146453011894530</ref><ref>Farmer, Ben, The Telegraph (16 February 2011) (United Kingdom) "Hamid Karzai's brother under US grand jury investigation The brother of Hamid Karzai is being investigated by a US grand jury over allegations of racketeering, extortion and tax evasion as he built a substantial business empire in Afghanistan." https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/afghanistan/8328696/Hamid-Karzais-brother-under-US-grand-jury-investigation.html</ref>
In 2013, Karzai, who has resided in Afghanistan since 2002, renounced his American citizenship to assume a bigger role in Afghan politics. The move was perceived as Mahmood expressing interest in running in the 2014 Presidential Election.
Mahmud Karzai is closely connected to the Kabul Bank scandal and former U.S. Congressman [[Donald L. Ritter]], a conservative, Jewish-American, [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican]] from [[Pennsylvania]], widely criticized and scrutinized for supporting big business interests allegedly involved with serious environmental degradation, [[toxic waste]], [[pollution]] and [[global warming]].<ref> Kistner, Toni, Network World News, (8 July 2002) "Of mysteries and bargaining chips..." http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1G1-89008530.html </ref> Ritter and Mahumud Karzai, closely associated on various controversial efforts and ventures, have been criticized by many policy experts, including investigative reporter [[Sibel Edmonds]], ''The Boiling Frogs Post'' newspaper, and other national security experts and whistle blowers, including the [[National Security Whistleblowers Coalition]] (NSWBC), for various alleged scandals and controversies.<ref>Edmonds, Sibel, The Boiling Frogs Post "The Assassination of Afghan Kingpin Karzai: A Case of Langley Liabilities Exceeding Its Asset?" http://www.boilingfrogspost.com/tag/ahmed-wali-karzai/#sthash.JcQeNqQF.dpuf</ref> Mahmud Karzai is also the brother of the controversial and assassinated figure [[Ahmed Wali Karzai]] who was allegedly killed by one of his bodyguards.
Democratic and Republican members of the U.S. Congress, who have supported U.S. efforts to assist Afghanistan, including [[Dana Rohrabacher]], have raised serious concerns and issues about Mahood Karzai's role in Afghanistan with Hamid Karzai and others.
== Business activities ==
=== Kabul Bank ===
Mahmood Karzai is a shareholder in [[Kabul Bank]], owning 20,548 shares, which represents 7.41% of the bank.<ref>http://www.kabulbank.af/html/Financials.html{{dead link|date=May 2017 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}</ref>
''The Washington Post'' and other investigative newspapers reported about the Kabul Bank scandal and Mahmood Karzai's role including the freezing of the Bank's assets in 2010.<ref>Higgins, Andrew, Washington Post (5 September 2010) "Officials freeze assets of Kabul Bank shareholders, excepting Karzai's brother" https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/09/05/AR2010090501144.html</ref>
During the September 2010 [[Bank run|run on the bank]] Mahmood Karzai reportedly told the ''[[Boston Globe]]'' that "America should do something."<ref>{{cite news| url=http://www.boston.com/news/world/asia/articles/2010/09/03/karzais_brother_calls_on_us_to_help_avert_afghan_bank_run/ | work=The Boston Globe | first1=Andrew | last1=Higgins | first2=Ernesto | last2=Londono | title=Karzai's brother calls on US to help avert Afghan bank run | date=2010-09-03}}</ref>
=== Toyota dealership ===
Karzai previously owned the only [[Toyota]] dealership in Afghanistan, [[Afghan Auto]] Limited.
=== AFCO International and Aynomena ===
Mahmood Karzai is a partner in Afco International company, the developer of Aynomena in Kandahar, Afghanistan.
=== Cement factory and coal mine scandal ===
Karzai allegedly owned, or leased, the only cement factory in Afghanistan, the Ghori Cement Factory, which investigative news reporters have found to have a host of troubling issues involving alleged corruption, cronyism, insider dealings involving the Kabul Bank scandal, unsafe working conditions and very low wages ($3 per day in 2010).<ref name="mcclatchydc.com">Landay, Jonathan, McClatchy News (14 November 2010), "Factory, coal mine show connections matter most in Afghan business" {{cite web |url=http://www.mcclatchydc.com/2010/11/14/v-print/103393/afghan-business-model-connections.html |title=Archived copy |accessdate=2013-08-26 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130928102729/http://www.mcclatchydc.com/2010/11/14/v-print/103393/afghan-business-model-connections.html |archivedate=2013-09-28 |df= }}</ref><ref>{{cite news| url=https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/afghanistan/5991447/Karzai-familys-wealth-fuelling-insurgency.html | location=London | work=The Daily Telegraph | first=Ben | last=Farmer | title=Karzai family's wealth 'fuelling insurgency' | date=2009-08-07}}</ref><ref>{{cite news| url=https://www.wsj.com/articles/SB10001424052748704103904575337240377163242 | work=The Wall Street Journal | title=Mahmood Karzai Isn't the Problem | date=2010-07-01}}</ref>
Independent news reporters have raised serious questions about the link between Mahood Karzai and his elder brother, President Hamid Karzai, especially as they relate to the cement factory scandal and alleged questionable ties between Karzai family, and public, finances.<ref>Spillius, Alex, & Farmer, Ben, The Telegraph, (7 August 2009)"Karzai Inc: Has Afghanistan's leader turned the country into a family business? https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/afghanistan/5990457/Karzai-Inc-Has-Afghanistans-leader-turned-the-country-into-a-family-business.html</ref>
Reports about Mahmood Karzai, his brother Ahmed Wali Karzai, and increased reports of problems with [[corruption in Afghanistan]] surrounding President Hamid Karzai's government persist.
=== Realty & real estate companies ===
Karzai owns numerous American companies under the name "Helmand", and finances realty companies from Massachusetts to Virginia.<ref>http://companies.findthecompany.com/l/22460998/Helmand-Investment-Llc-in-Fairfax-Station-VA</ref>
An alleged bitter Karzai family business dispute between Mahmoud Karzai and his brother, Shah Wali Karzai, reportedly centered around a large property and housing complex project in [[Kandahar]], Afghanistan.

'''The Nenana Ice Classic''' is an annual ice pool contest held in [[Nenana, Alaska]]. It is a fundraising event in which individuals attempt to guess the exact time the [[Tanana River]] ice will break up at Nenana.<ref>{{cite web |title=Tripod Days in Nenana set for this weekend |url=http://www.newsminer.com/news/local_news/tripod-days-in-nenana-set-for-this-weekend/article_a5af6772-c179-11e4-a9e2-0f3f2a732dd8.html |publisher=[[Fairbanks Daily News-Miner]]|accessdate=March 15, 2015}}</ref> Tickets are on sale from February 1 through April 5 of each year throughout Alaska. The Nenana Ice Classic is a non-profit charitable gaming organization. As such, the proceeds benefit many volunteer and non-profit organizations. [[File:Tanana River in Nenana.jpg|thumb|325px|The Tanana River with the tripod on the ice during the 2008 Nenana Ice Classic. The [[Mears Memorial Bridge]] is in the background.]] [[File:Nenana Tripod.jpg|thumb|upright|Closeup of the tripod, sitting on dry land. This large striped wooden structure is placed on the frozen Tanana River each year.]]
==History== The Ice Classic began as an ice [[betting pool]] in 1906 with six entries: Adolph Nelson, Jim Duke, Gunnysack Jack, Jonesy, Louis and Joe Johnson, and the first winner, Oliver Lee.<ref name="Classic">{{cite news|page=A1|newspaper=[[Anchorage Daily News]]|date=April 20, 1997|title=An Alaska Classic: Betting On Breakup Is More Than Just A Game Of Chance In Nenana|author=Sheila Toomey}}</ref> After coming the closest to betting on breakup of the [[Tanana River|Tanana ice]], Lee won an equivalent amount of "a couple of rounds at the trading post bar."<ref name="Classic"/> The ice pool subsequently became inactive until 1916.<ref name="Classic"/> In that year, railroad workers revived the betting through ticket sales at Jimmy Duke's Roadhouse, but limited the betting to Nenana residents.<ref name="Classic"/> After word of the lottery spread to towns along the local railroad by [[Alaska Engineering Commission|Alaska Railroad Commission]] workers, the lottery was opened up to residents of the Alaska and Yukon territories in 1917.<ref name="Classic"/>
In 1917, railroad engineers bet $801 on when the ice would break. In 2009 the 93rd annual prize money was $283,723. In 2014 the jackpot was a record $363,627.<ref>Official Website http://www.nenanaakiceclassic.com/</ref> Since the Classic's beginning in 1906 over 10 million dollars in prize money has been given away.
==The tripod== The "tripod", which actually has four supports, is planted on the river ice between the highway and railroad bridges in Nenana, 300 ft from the shore. The tripod is connected to a clock which stops as the ice goes out, moving the tripod with it. The Nenana Ice Classic annual festival is the time that the tripod is erected on the ice of the frozen Tanana River. The tripod parts are built and painted prior to the festival sourcing local timber and enlisting community members. Using a chainsaw, a trough is carved into the river ice which is usually around three feet thick at that time of year. The base of the tripod is lowered into the trough. An auger is implemented to bore a hole further into the ice until the river water is released, flooding the trough. This will freeze the tripod securely to the frozen river. As a high point during the festival the community gathers together and using ropes attached to the tripod uprights they work together to lift the uprights into place. The uprights are then secured to each other. A line is attached to the top of the tripod and once that end is anchored the other end is taken to the Ice Classic tower nearby on the banks of the river. Attached there to the clock inside the tower, when the ice goes out and moves the tripod 100 feet the line breaks and stops the clock. <sup>[3]</sup>
==Ice measurements== The Tanana River at Nenana usually freezes between October and November, reaching an average peak thickness of {{convert|41|in|cm|0}} on April 1. The ice then melts on top due to weather and bottom due to water movement.
